threads.excerpt: **User:** Okay, Fred, I need your help. I'm trying to change, I need to set up my new laptop, which is the more appropriate one to house the MCP ecosystem, or bridge design. But it's a Snapdragon lapt

learnings.summary: Methodology: But you’re also absolutely right to pause here: **this screen won’t get you to Azure AD join**, beca
learnings.details: But you’re also absolutely right to pause here: **this screen won’t get you to Azure AD join**, because it's the *legacy domain/workgroup join* method — only for local networks and Windows Server domains, **not** Microsoft 365 Azure Active Directory (AAD) joins
learnings.evidence: But you’re also absolutely right to pause here: **this screen won’t get you to Azure AD join**, because it's the *legacy domain/workgroup join* method — only for local networks and Windows Server domains, **not** Microsoft 365 Azure Active Directory (AAD) joins

thinking_patterns.exploration_style: Deep dive - thorough exploration of topics
